@Igloczek @remotesynth @stefanjudis @timbenniks Oh I see. I'd say that an application providing an API is unlikely to be built as Jamstack. (unless read-only, perhaps) But it might be *consumed* by a Jamstack site and be part of the Jamstack ecosystem.
